section.title: Description
section.p: This C++ application demonstrates how to add and modify anniversary entries using the Calendar Interim API (also known as CalInterim API). The Calendar Interim API replaced the Agenda Model API in Symbian OS v9.1 (S60 3rd Edition). The application has been updated to be compatible with S60 5th Edition and touch UI. Important classes: CCalEntry, CCalEntryView, CCalInstance, CCalInstanceView, CCalAlarm, CCalSession, MCalProgressCallBack. Click on the following link for more information on this example: S60 Platform: Calendar Interim API Example

section.title: Download
section.p: Click on the following link to download the example: CalenderExample.zip
Click: browse to view the example code.
